source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video presents an extreme wide shot of a landscape, with no single main subject. The scene is captured from an elevated position, looking down on two parallel highways that originate at the bottom left and bottom right of the frame and recede toward a central vanishing point in the background. The top two-thirds of the frame are occupied by a vast expanse of dark, turbulent clouds in the middle ground and background. A band of intense orange light and falling rain is situated centrally along the horizon in the far background. The arid terrain fills the bottom of the frame in the foreground and middle ground, on either side of the highways. As the time-lapse progresses, the clouds swirl across the top and center of the frame, while streaks of white light move from the bottom left toward the center on the left highway, and red light streaks move from the center toward the bottom right on the right highway.
